patterns: What is the affiliation of NSAKCET?
Which university is NSAKCET affiliated with?
Is NSAKCET affiliated to Osmania University?
What is the current affiliation status?
responses:
**Current Affiliation Status of NSAKCET:**

‚Ä¢ NSAKCET is **primarily affiliated with Osmania University (OU)** for most of its UG and PG engineering programs
‚Ä¢ This is the current and official affiliation status

**Important Notes:**
‚Ä¢ Undergraduate (B.Tech/B.E) programs are affiliated with Osmania University
‚Ä¢ Postgraduate (M.Tech) programs are also under Osmania University
‚Ä¢ You may find some older references or certain contexts still mentioning JNTU-Hyderabad, but these reflect outdated information or transitional affiliations
‚Ä¢ For admission procedures and degree certificates, follow Osmania University guidelines

**Accreditation & Approval:**
‚Ä¢ AICTE Approved
‚Ä¢ NAAC 'B+' Grade
‚Ä¢ UGC Autonomous Status

Yes, NSAKCET is officially affiliated with Osmania University. While some older listings or certain contexts might still reference JNTU-Hyderabad, the prevailing and current information confirms Osmania University as the active affiliation for all major programs including CSE, Civil Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, and M.Tech specializations.

The college's current affiliation is with Osmania University. If you encounter mixed listings mentioning JNTU-Hyderabad, those are likely outdated references. For all practical purposes including admissions, examinations, and degree certificates, Osmania University guidelines apply.

patterns: Tell me about the UG programs
responses:
**Complete Program Offerings at NSAKCET:**

**üéì Undergraduate Programs (B.Tech/B.E):**
‚Ä¢ **Computer Science & Engineering (CSE)** - 60 seats
‚Ä¢ **CSE (Data Science)** - 60 seats
‚Ä¢ **CSE (AI & ML)** - 60 seats
‚Ä¢ **CSE (IoT & Cyber Security including Blockchain)** - 60 seats
‚Ä¢ **Information Technology (IT)** - 60 seats
‚Ä¢ **Civil Engineering** - 180 seats
‚Ä¢ **Mechanical Engineering** - 180 seats

**üéì Postgraduate Programs (M.Tech):**
‚Ä¢ **Computer Science & Engineering** - 18 seats
‚Ä¢ **Structural Engineering** - 18 seats
‚Ä¢ **Heat Ventilation & Air Conditioning (HVAC)** - 18 seats
‚Ä¢ **Embedded Systems** - 18 seats

**üéì Diploma Programs (Polytechnic):**
‚Ä¢ **Civil Engineering** - 30 seats
‚Ä¢ **Electrical & Electronics Engineering (EEE)** - 30 seats
‚Ä¢ **Electronics & Communication Engineering (ECE)** - 30 seats
‚Ä¢ **Mechanical Engineering** - 30 seats

**Total Intake:** 720+ students across all programs

NSAKCET offers comprehensive engineering education with modern specializations. The college is known for its CSE programs with cutting-edge specializations in Data Science, AI & ML, and IoT & Cyber Security. Traditional engineering branches like Civil and Mechanical Engineering have higher intake capacity. The M.Tech programs focus on advanced areas like Structural Engineering, HVAC, and Embedded Systems, preparing students for specialized industry roles.

The college provides a well-balanced mix of programs:
- **High-demand CSE specializations** with 60 seats each
- **Core engineering branches** (Civil & Mechanical) with 180 seats each
- **Advanced M.Tech programs** with 18 seats each for focused learning
- **Diploma programs** for skill-based education with 30 seats each

All programs are affiliated with Osmania University and follow industry-relevant curriculum.

patterns: What is the fee for M.Tech?
responses:
**üí∞ Complete Fee Structure at NSAKCET (2024-25):**

**üéì Undergraduate Programs (B.Tech):**
‚Ä¢ **Regular Fee:** ‚Çπ68,000 per year
‚Ä¢ **Total for 4 years:** ‚Çπ2,72,000

**üéì Postgraduate Programs (M.Tech):**
‚Ä¢ **Regular Fee:** ‚Çπ57,000 per year
‚Ä¢ **Total for 2 years:** ‚Çπ1,14,000

**üéì Diploma Programs:**
‚Ä¢ **Regular Fee:** ‚Çπ15,500 - ‚Çπ15,550 per year
‚Ä¢ **Total for 3 years:** ‚Çπ46,500 - ‚Çπ46,650

**üíº Management Quota Fees (Example - CSE):**
‚Ä¢ **Annual Fee:** ‚Çπ73,000 per year
‚Ä¢ **One-time Charges:** ~‚Çπ2,00,000
‚Ä¢ **Additional First-year Fees:** Up to ‚Çπ1,60,000
‚Ä¢ **Total First Year:** ~‚Çπ4,33,000
‚Ä¢ **Subsequent Years:** ‚Çπ73,000 per year

**üìã Additional Charges:**
‚Ä¢ Development Fee, Library Fee, Lab Fee, etc. (as applicable)
‚Ä¢ Examination fees (as per university norms)
‚Ä¢ Transportation charges (if availed)

*Note: Fees are subject to change. Please contact the college administration for the most current and detailed fee structure.*

**üéì Complete Admission Process at NSAKCET:**

**üìã For B.Tech Programs:**
‚Ä¢ **Primary Route:** TS EAMCET counseling
‚Ä¢ **Eligibility:** 10+2 with Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics
‚Ä¢ **Minimum Marks:** 45% (40% for reserved categories)
‚Ä¢ **Entrance Exam:** TS EAMCET (Telangana State Engineering, Agriculture & Medical Common Entrance Test)
‚Ä¢ **Counseling:** Online counseling through TS EAMCET portal
‚Ä¢ **Management Quota:** Direct admission available (higher fees apply)

**üìã For M.Tech Programs:**
‚Ä¢ **Primary Route:** TS PGECET (Post Graduate Engineering Common Entrance Test)
‚Ä¢ **Alternative:** GATE qualified candidates
‚Ä¢ **Eligibility:** B.Tech/B.E in relevant discipline with minimum 50% marks
‚Ä¢ **Selection:** Based on entrance exam scores and counseling

**üìã For Diploma Programs:**
‚Ä¢ **Admission:** Merit-based on qualifying examination
‚Ä¢ **Eligibility:** 10th pass with minimum 35% marks
‚Ä¢ **Management Quota:** Available for direct admission

**üìÑ Required Documents:**
‚Ä¢ 10th and 12th mark sheets and certificates
‚Ä¢ Transfer Certificate (TC)
‚Ä¢ Migration Certificate (if applicable)
‚Ä¢ Aadhaar Card
‚Ä¢ Caste Certificate (if applicable)
‚Ä¢ Income Certificate (if applicable)
‚Ä¢ Passport size photographs
‚Ä¢ Parent's income certificate

**üìÖ Important Dates:**
‚Ä¢ TS EAMCET: Usually conducted in May-June
‚Ä¢ TS PGECET: Usually conducted in May-June
‚Ä¢ Application deadlines vary each year

*For specific dates and detailed procedures, visit the official TS EAMCET/TS PGECET websites or contact the college admission office.*

NSAKCET provides comprehensive facilities to support academic excellence and student development. The campus features modern infrastructure with well-equipped laboratories, a resourceful library, and comfortable learning spaces. Students have access to sports facilities, cafeteria, medical care, and transportation services. While there's no on-campus hostel, the college is located in a well-connected area with various accommodation options nearby.

The college campus offers:
- **State-of-the-art academic facilities** with modern equipment
- **Extensive library resources** including digital access
- **Sports and fitness facilities** for student wellness
- **Essential amenities** like cafeteria, medical center, and transportation
- **Technology-enabled learning** with Wi-Fi and smart classrooms

All facilities are maintained to high standards to ensure a conducive learning environment for students.
